<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_ndderiqw1G1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/8858b51fb2f2a45515b89f733c244b96/tumblr_inline_nddesagpQ01rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p><strong>Starstrider42</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1z3goUl"><strong>CUSTOM ASTEROIDS</strong></a> reworks the ARM asteroid system in such a way that it provides more variation and greater customization in where and how you encounter asteroids throughout the game. Asteroid belts, gradually-spawned asteroids and cometary orbits are all well featured in this add-on. Best part of all is if you have a preference towards, well, anything, you can change many details within Custom Asteroids to suit your needs.</p>

<p>Find out more about Custom Asteroids <a href="http://bit.ly/1z3goUl"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
This needs to be in the main game. Also second (maybe)

I would love for asteroids to be distributed more realistically in the stock game. I'm downloading this as soon as I upgrade to 0.25.

(Third. )

Seems like time to play rosetta and philae!

This looks awesome!

(fourth?)

I've seen this before, and I'm not big on realism, so I don't really feel inclined to download it.

(FIFTH FTW )

This is nice - now how can I build a probe that looks like philea...

Now I feel obligated to give it a try.
